POMO3.SA.summary: Marcopolo S.A. manufactures and sells buses, automobiles, wagons, parts, and agricultural and industrial machinery in Brazil, Africa, Australia, China, Peru, and Mexico. The company operates in Industrial and Financial segments. It offers intercity vehicles, urban vehicles, and micro and minibuses; manufactures car bodies for buses and minibuses, as well as their parts, components, and accessories. The company is also involved in trading and distribution of parts for vehicles; and the provision of technical services regarding foreign trade, as well as banking services. Marcopolo S.A. was founded in 1949 and is based in Caxias do Sul, Brazil.
